parameters.text: ðŸš¨ Insufficient funds detected! Balance: {{$json["balance"]}}, Payouts: {{$json["payouts"]}}
âŒ Error occurred in ClaimChain workflow: {{$json["error"]}}

parameters.functionCode: return [{ json: { claimId: Date.now(), claimant: $json["body"].wallet, details: $json["body"].details, evidence: $json["body"].evidence, status: "PENDING" } }];
return [{ json: { claimId: $json["body"].claimId, juror: $json["body"].juror, commitHash: $json["body"].commitHash } }];

parameters.text: New claim filed. Please commit your vote (approve/deny).

parameters.query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS claims (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    claimant VARCHAR(100),
    amount NUMERIC(12,2),
    status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'pending',
    evidence JSONB,
    decision VARCHAR(50),
    payout_tx VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS votes (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_id INT REFERENCES claims(id),
    juror_id VARCHAR(100),
    commit_hash VARCHAR(255),
    revealed_vote VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

parameters.text: ðŸš¨ Claim {{$json["id"]}} payout failed. Please check DB.

parameters.query: UPDATE claims SET status='approved', resolved_at=NOW() WHERE claim_id={{$json.claimId}};

parameters.text: âœ… Claim {{$json.claimId}} approved and paid out.

parameters.query: UPDATE claims SET status='rejected', resolved_at=NOW() WHERE claim_id={{$json.claimId}};

parameters.text: âŒ Claim {{$json.claimId}} rejected after juror review.

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO claim_events (claim_id, event_type, payload)
VALUES ({{$json.claimId}}, '{{$json.resolution || "status_update"}}', {{$json}});

INSERT INTO claims (claim_id, user_id, amount, evidence_url, status)
VALUES ({{$json.claimId}}, {{$json.userId}}, {{$json.amount}}, {{$json.evidenceUrl}}, 'submitted');

parameters.text: âš ï¸ Fraud alert on Claim {{$json.claimId}}

parameters.functionCode: return [{json:{...$json, oracleApproved:true, signature:"0xtest"}}];
return [{json:{...$json, commitVotes:["yes","yes","no"]}}];
return [{ json: { claimId: Date.now(), ...items[0].json } }];
return [{ json: { claimId: $json.claimId, phase: 'commit', status: 'awaiting votes' } }];
return [{ json: { claimId: $json.claimId, phase: 'reveal', verdicts: $json.verdicts } }];
return [{ json: { status: 'ok', uptime: process.uptime(), dlqSize: (global.dlq||[]).length } }];
